name: Ice Devil
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren\'t silvered

traits.Devil's Sight: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.
traits.Magic Resistance: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The devil makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d10 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d10 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.
actions.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d10 + 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.
actions.Wall of Ice (Recharge 6): The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.
